medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at age 7 years old with a 24-hour urinary protein excretion of 8.34 g. The patient had normal blood pressure and 3+ urinary albumin, with serum albumin at 24 g/L.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Family history of steroid-resistant nephrotic syndrome (SRNS) and focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS). The patient progressed to end-stage renal disease (ESRD) by age 15 and received a kidney transplant at age 16.4.
medical_history.family_history: Parents (I1 and I2) are healthy; siblings (II2 and II3) affected by SRNS, both died of ESRD at age 17. Two siblings (II1 and II4) died of unknown causes in early childhood.
